hadiths.text: Narrated 'Amir bin Rabi`a:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If any one of you see a funeral procession and he is not going along with it, then he should stand and remain standing till he gets behind it, or it leaves him behind, or the coffin is put down before it goes ahead of him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَتَى يَقْعُدُ إِذَا قَامَ لِلْجَنَازَةِ
chapter.eng-name: when should one sit after standing for the funeral procession?
